head.supplied: Saturday night ¶ ¶ Can you kindly inform me, dear Mr. Odgers, whether the Ballarat farmers club did receive a copy of the educational collection? If not, I could take one up, if yet one to spare, and...

div.p: H75/5248, unit 810, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Can you kindly inform me, dear Mr. Odgers, whether the Ballarat farmers club did receive a copy of the educational collection? If not, I could take one up, if yet one to spare, and present it on behalf of Mr. Ramsay, should the honorable gentleman approve of it.
For reply see William Odgers to M, 14 May 1875.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. von Mueller
The letter is minuted: 'This Society has not been supplied from this office. Here are still some spare copies A.G. 11.5.75.' Robert Ramsay replied: 'Forward copy RR 12.5.75'. [there is an extra bit: '… &c Govt Bot 14.5.75—K581'].
